hr hai wo college ka professor nhi jo tumhe ye sab shikhaye
HR as a profession shouldn't even exist üòÇüòÇ. Bakwass log bakwass job. Dub ke marr jaao tum log rangoli hi banana h toh apne ghar pe kro.
Karta to sirf frustrate hai

Acha chacha ? Talent Indentification agar na ho to Recruitment kaise hogi aur vo kaun karta hai? Organisation men Training & Development Department hoti hai which is invloved in talent development. Ijp ke madhyam se talent ko nurture kaun karta hai?.. Visison is not created by HR , but the founders HR does its role in communicating it .. HR ensures an environment which is free and fair for other to work upto their potential. Is chiz ko kaun ensure karta hai ki seniors apne juniors ko authority k
HR ke kaam Mein lunch karne ka time bhi nahi milta!! Itna bada muh kholne se pehle HR dept. Ke logo ki halat dekh aao real grounds par
Pehle sbko atcha lgta hain ab Humse h puch lo lol Halath kharab ho jta hain HR main. . üòÖ
Lala company mein to HR ki job. Helper se bhi buri hoti haih.
Haaan bhai....tu budget sanction kra k de
Sir ji, HR me bhi alag alag positions hain, based on that wo log apna kam karte hi hai, Pehale khud samajh lo sahi se HR dept ke bare me fir explanation dena,
Sir may currently MBA from HR soch rhi thi.. toh please btaiye..KRU ya NAHI??
Aalsi logo ki fav job üòÅ
Right HR is useless department aur koi boss ko khubsurat ladki dikh gayi to use HR bana deta hai with higher package
Badhiya hai bechara Jindagi Jee Raha hai apni jeene do usko Jindagi bharr to Marr hi Raha tha bechara
Same kapde pehen ke jaoge toh kapdo se smell aayega hi naüòÇ
Bhai aajkal toh hr bhi roj same kapde pehen rahe hai. Bechari ko salary nahi mili hogi
Sir Mai BA graduation üéì arts Urdu se hai kiya Mai kar sakte hai HR course
Esi bhi koi HR rakhta hai, client meet me esi sales girls ki jarurat padti hai taki client competitor ke paas naa jae. Invest in the right place not in satisfaction
Aisi HR ho to bina salary kaam kar lenge.
Kya item hai kasam se!
Bas itni khubsurat HR dekh ke toh ab interview dena zaruri ho gaya kab aajaun mashallah HR ma‚Äôam? üòç‚ú®
Hr ki salary kitni hoti h sir just dail m
Hamara situation bhi asa hai üòÖ
Mamta respect hi nahin hai good morning mam good afternoon mam good evening mam yah kaun bolega
Jitna makhan lagana hai lga lo üòÇ woh job reference wale ko hi dega üòÖüòÖüòÇ

Kaam dene me bht saare nakhre.ki wazeh se accha staff nhi milta hai .boll bachan karne wale ko job pehle milti hai . Job k interview ko itna hard bana diya hai k job karne wala be confused ho k interview de nhi pata hai.

Hello mai jana sonchriun dubai job ke liye as a fresher tbh zada skills nahi just degrees hai mere pas recently 2weeks bfr maine apna mba k last sem ke exams diye hai lkn kuch computer skills nahi hai mere pass so kis type ki jobs milnge udar kuch idea hai ?
Hindi language kyuu nhi interview hota h... Kamal h indian h pr english ko lekar bethe h itni buri bt h üò¢üò¢üò¢üò¢
Or hame English hi nhi aati ho toüò¢
Hindi me baat ni kr sakte kya maam?üò¢

Ye second kutta sala bol rha hai india mai kuch nhi hua sale ka dimag khrab ho gya ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ logo ki jane gyi hai aur bol rha hai india me kuuch nhi hua hai chloo india ki btt choro india mai ho ya na ho pakistan me bohot kuch hoga no water no life
Ki punjabi vich v bol sakte hai
Darr lag rha he yaar ‚ö†Ô∏èmai kya karuüò±
Jayaya eng math jar england bejdunga British se sakhth nafrath hai mujhe Chakde INDIA
Tere ko job do or na do tu keya logo ko samne jukkar chalunga keya? Respect yourself
Mam apka chehra thoda tedha ata hai aur apki nose bhi same yahi problem mere sath hai log bahut notice karte
Nice english shikati ho mam...!!

Aap bahut achha samjhati hai
English gai bhad mein you very lovely
Company me jop ka laya jop
Itna sara bolne kaliae interviewer ke pass Time nhi hota Adhi baat mein Okay kehe deta hai interviewer.üòÖ
Etna fast to rata lag raha hai
Interviewer knows ki aesa reply aaya toh smjh jao ki ratta lgakr aaya hai pakka
Do you have any questions? Me : No, but if you have anything to tell me you can tell üôÇ ( last interview me humne ye bola tha üòÇ )
Interviewer : Do you have any questions? Me : Yes! Ye office band kitne baje hota hai....??üòÇüòÇ
Itni english muje iss janm me to nhi aayegi..... Mere bss ki baat nhiüò¢
Interviewer:Why should we hire you? Me: Ek baap ke hoge toh kar loge sir üòÖ
Interview me aisa nakhra hota hai jaise 4 ladki tumhar ghar se hum shaadi kar k lejane wale hai .ladki pasand karte samay be koi itna nakhra nhi deekhata hai
Ladki pasand karte samay koi itna nakhara nhi dikhata hai jitna interview me nakhra deekhate hai .
Interview me itne nakhre ho gaye hai k log interview face karna nhi chahte hai
Skills matter nahi karti english aani chahiye bss , qq mother tongue me har koi interview me comfortable hi rahega na
Interviewer be like :- saas to le , jawab to dene de , sab ek saath he rata hua nikal diya
